title: InvestSmart AI fintech website (frontend) with risk-profiling chatbot, results, and supporting pages

requirements.summary: Create a mobile-friendly InvestSmart AI homepage with fintech landing layout, risk profiling explanation, required sections, and primary CTA routing to the chatbot.
acceptanceCriteria: Homepage renders without errors on mobile and desktop widths.
CTA button text is exactly “Get My Investment Plan”.
Homepage includes distinct content blocks for: risk profiling explanation, why invest, compounding, risk vs return, diversification.

file_operations.description: Implement a clean, mobile-friendly fintech landing page with distinct sections for risk profiling explanation, Why invest, Power of compounding, Risk vs return, and Diversification; include primary CTA button labeled exactly “Get My Investment Plan” that navigates to the chatbot flow. (If using shadcn-ui layout primitives like Card/Button, verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.)

Add routing and layout wiring so the homepage is reachable at the root route and the CTA navigates into the chatbot route; include shared header/footer layout wrapper. (If using shadcn-ui navigation/menu primitives, verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.)

requirements.summary: Implement a step-by-step conversational chatbot UI to collect all required risk profiling inputs before allowing plan generation.
acceptanceCriteria: Chatbot asks for all listed fields and does not allow generating a plan until all answers are provided.
Investment goal choices include: wealth creation, retirement, education, travel, emergency fund.
Investment horizon choices include: 1–3 yrs, 3–5 yrs, 5–10 yrs, 10+ yrs.
Risk tolerance choices match the three sentences provided.
Investment knowledge choices include: beginner, intermediate, advanced.

file_operations.description: Create the chatbot page container with a conversational UI shell (message list + input controls) and route-level layout; ensure the flow is mobile-friendly and progresses step-by-step through: age, monthly income, investment goal, investment horizon, risk tolerance (exact 3 sentences), and investment knowledge level. (If using shadcn-ui components like Button/Input/Select/Card, verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.)

Implement the state machine/step manager for the conversational risk profiling flow: enforce required answers for all fields, provide fixed choice options exactly as specified, and only enable 'generate plan' once the profile is complete. (If using shadcn-ui Select/RadioGroup components, verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.)

Add helper utilities to normalize/validate inputs (e.g., parse age/income, map investment horizon and risk tolerance selections to numeric codes suitable for backend calls) and to produce user-friendly labels for display.

Wire the chatbot route into the app router and ensure navigation can reach it from the header (and from homepage CTA). (If using shadcn-ui navigation primitives, verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.)

requirements.summary: Create a chatbot results screen that displays risk profile, allocation visualization, SIP suggestion, 3 model portfolios, and do’s/don’ts using backend recommendation response.
acceptanceCriteria: Results view displays the profile label (Conservative/Moderate/Aggressive).
A pie chart is rendered from the allocation percentages; if a chart cannot be rendered, a clear fallback visualization (e.g., labeled percentage list) is shown.
Monthly SIP suggestion is displayed as a currency-formatted monthly amount derived from the provided user inputs (at minimum monthly income and/or goal/horizon) and described in simple English.
Exactly 3 model portfolios are displayed, each with clear components aligned to the user’s risk profile allocation.
A Do’s and Don’ts section is shown with at least 3 items each, written in simple English.

file_operations.description: Implement the final output/results UI: show risk profile label, allocation visualization, monthly SIP suggestion, exactly 3 model portfolios aligned to the profile, and a do’s/don’ts list (>=3 each) in simple English; consume the backend recommendation response and avoid hardcoding the full recommendation output in the UI. (If using shadcn-ui Card/Badge/Button components, verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.)

Render an allocation pie chart from percentage data; include a robust fallback (labeled percentage list) if chart rendering fails or data is incomplete. Keep it lightweight (e.g., SVG-based) to avoid adding new dependencies.

Add currency formatting helpers and a simple, educational (non-advisory) SIP suggestion calculator derived from collected inputs (at minimum monthly income and/or goal/horizon), returning a monthly amount and short explanation string.

Create a small hook that uses the existing actor from frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts to call backend classifyProfile(...) and generateRecommendation(...), then adapts the response into view-ready data for the results screen. (Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing if using shadcn-ui loading/skeleton primitives.)

Integrate results rendering into the chatbot flow: once all answers are collected, call the backend via the actor to get classification and recommendation, then render the results screen; ensure the user cannot generate a plan until all answers are present. (If using shadcn-ui components for steps/progress, verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.)

requirements.summary: Create a Learn Investing page with blog-style beginner-friendly, GenZ-friendly educational content and navigation access.
acceptanceCriteria: A Learn Investing page exists and is reachable via site navigation.
The page displays multiple blog entries or sections with readable headings and short paragraphs.
Content tone is simple English and beginner-friendly.

file_operations.description: Implement a Learn Investing page with multiple blog-style sections (headings + short paragraphs) in simple, GenZ-friendly English with minimal jargon. (If using shadcn-ui Card/Accordion components, verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.)

Create a reusable site header that includes navigation links to required pages (Home, Chatbot, Learn Investing, SIP Calculator, About, Disclaimer) and displays the InvestSmart AI logo asset. (If using shadcn-ui navigation/menu components, verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.)
Wire the Learn Investing route into the router and ensure the header nav link points to it.

requirements.summary: Create a mobile-friendly SIP Calculator page with validated inputs and clear projection results.
acceptanceCriteria: SIP Calculator page exists and is reachable via navigation.
Users can enter SIP inputs (at minimum: monthly investment, expected rate/return, and duration) and see computed results.
Validation prevents empty/invalid inputs from producing NaN/blank results.

file_operations.description: Implement a SIP calculator page with a mobile-friendly form (monthly investment, expected rate/return, duration) and a clear results panel; include input validation and prevent NaN/blank results. (If using shadcn-ui Input/Button/Card components, verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.)
Add pure calculation utilities for SIP projection plus validation helpers (e.g., required fields, numeric ranges) to keep UI logic simple and avoid NaN propagation.
Wire the SIP Calculator route into the router and ensure the header nav includes a link to it.

requirements.summary: Create an About Us page describing InvestSmart AI’s purpose for beginner investors and make it reachable via navigation.
acceptanceCriteria: About page exists and is reachable via navigation.
About page includes a short description of InvestSmart AI’s purpose for beginner investors.

file_operations.description: Implement the About Us page with a short, beginner-friendly description of InvestSmart AI’s purpose and a minimal fintech layout. (If using shadcn-ui Card components, verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.)
Wire the About route into the router and ensure navigation links reach it.

requirements.summary: Create a Disclaimer page stating educational-only content and explicitly “Not SEBI advice”, reachable via navigation/footer.
acceptanceCriteria: Disclaimer page exists and is reachable via navigation (and/or footer).
Disclaimer text includes both concepts: educational only and “Not SEBI advice”.

file_operations.description: Implement a Disclaimer page with clear text stating the content is educational only and explicitly includes the phrase “Not SEBI advice”; keep language simple and prominent. (If using shadcn-ui Alert components, verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.)

Create a site footer that includes a visible link to the Disclaimer page and short educational-only reminder text. (If using shadcn-ui layout primitives, verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.)
Wire the Disclaimer route into the router and ensure it is reachable from navigation and/or footer links.

requirements.summary: Apply consistent fintech styling and GenZ-friendly simple-English tone across all pages with mobile-friendly layouts and blue/white/green palette.
acceptanceCriteria: Primary UI palette uses blue/white/green consistently across header, buttons, and accents.
Typography and spacing read as minimal/fintech (no cluttered layouts).
All primary flows (homepage CTA, chatbot, calculator) are usable on small screens without horizontal scrolling.
User-facing copy avoids complex finance jargon and uses short, clear sentences.

file_operations.description: Define global styles and Tailwind CSS variables/theme tokens to support a minimal fintech look using a consistent blue/white/green palette; ensure good mobile typography, spacing, and accessible contrast.
Adjust/extend Tailwind theme tokens (e.g., primary/accent/chart colors) to align with the blue/white/green fintech palette and ensure consistent styling across pages.
Ensure the shared layout applies consistent container widths, spacing, and responsive behavior (no horizontal scrolling on small screens) across all routes.
Refine homepage copy to be simple English, GenZ-friendly, and jargon-light while keeping the required sections and fintech minimal design.
Ensure Learn Investing content tone remains simple English, GenZ-friendly, and avoids complex jargon; keep layout minimal and readable on mobile.
Ensure SIP calculator labels/help text are beginner-friendly and the layout remains usable on small screens without horizontal scrolling.
Ensure the chatbot UI (prompts, button labels, help text) is clear, friendly, non-advisory, and mobile-first; keep spacing/typography consistent with the fintech theme.

requirements.summary: Add generated brand assets under frontend/public/assets/generated and use them in the UI (header + homepage hero) as static files.
acceptanceCriteria: Generated images exist under frontend/public/assets/generated.
UI renders the logo in the site header and uses the hero illustration on the homepage.
No backend endpoints are used to serve images.

file_operations.description: Add the generated InvestSmart AI wordmark logo static asset at this exact path and filename for direct frontend use (no backend image serving).
Add the generated homepage hero illustration static asset at this exact path and filename for direct frontend use (no backend image serving).
Add the generated set of 3 minimal line icons static asset at this exact path and filename for direct frontend use (no backend image serving).
Render the logo image from frontend/public/assets/generated/investsmart-logo.dim_512x128.png in the site header; keep it responsive and accessible (alt text).

Use the hero illustration from frontend/public/assets/generated/investsmart-hero.dim_1600x900.png in the homepage hero section; optionally incorporate the icons image from frontend/public/assets/generated/investsmart-icons.dim_512x512.png in feature/benefit callouts; ensure assets are referenced as static frontend files (no backend routing).
